name: Rogério Jorge
body:
# Rogério Jorge's Github

Welcome to my Github page! I am learning everyday and as a new project comes up I will soon post it here.
I am a strong advocate of open source and I keep private repositories only for unfinished/not personal codes (despite the fact that I never consider a code finished "per se").

Well, here are my ## recent projects

### Ray Tracing Solver

https://github.com/Rogeriodejesusjorge/RTS

Software: Mathematica
Uses a Monte Carlo and a 2nd order method to solve ray equations through an Hamiltonian formalism.

### General Relativistic Vorticity Solver

https://github.com/Rogeriodejesusjorge/grvs

Software: Mathematica
Solving General Relativistic geodesic equations for a general space-time metric, finds the Lorentz factor as a functino of the radius and computes the magnetic field seed.

### N-Particle with Lorentz Force

https://github.com/Rogeriodejesusjorge/Matlab-Lorentz-Solver

Software: Matlab
For user input electric and magnetic fields, it solves the Lorentz force equation for a limited amount of specified time steps and outputs to a video. All particles are initialized with a given temperature (Gaussian distribution).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
